src:
Došlo vreme da i Golden stejt iznenadi, Sansi se ne šale [VIDEO]
05 Nov 2019, 09:37 by Nemanja
Košarkaši Golden stejt Voriorsa pobedili su u noći između ponedeljka i utorka ekipu Portland Trajlblejzersa 127:118.
Ništa ovo ne bi bilo čudno, da je u pitanju neka od prethodnih pet sezona, ali u ovoj, stvari se odvijaju malo drugačije. Totalno drugačiji sastav u odnosu na prošlogodišnji tim izveo je ponovo na parket Stiv Ker protiv favorizovanog Portlanda sa sve Si-Džej Mekalumom i Demijenom Lilardom i uspeo u onome čemu se malo ko nadao – da ih pobedi.
Vodili su košarkaši Voriorsa gotovo tokom celog meča, da bi samo u jednom momentu sredinom utakmice izgubili prenodnost. Druga pobeda u sezoni, prva u novoj hali, ,,Čejs centru“ za bolje raspoloženje u ekipi iako im, kako se stvari odvijaju, cilj može biti i takozvano ,,tankovanje“.
Erik Paskal je imao sjajno veče sa 34 poena i 13 skokova za domaće, dok je Ki Bovman upisao 19. U dresu Portlanda istakao se Lilard sa 39 poena.



Blago iznenađenje, prema ,,bukmejkerima“ zabeležila je i ekipa Finiks Sansa pošto su na svom parketu savladali, do sada, jedinu neporaženu ekipu u NBA ligi – Filadelfija Seventisikserse. Neizvestan meč, pun preokreta ipak je u finišu pripao Sansima, ali je Devin Buker sa nekoliko vezanih poena napravio razliku na samom kraju i doneo radost domaćim navijačima u Finiksu.
Upravo je Buker bio nabolji akter meča sa 40 poena, dok je odličnu rolu imao i Riki Rubio sa 21 poenom i 10 skokova.
U gostujućem sastavu Al Harford je imao učinak od 34 poena, Tobajas Heris od 24 i 10 skokova, a Furkan Korkmaz je upisao 20 poena.



Memfis Grizlisi našeg Marka Gudurića poraženi su od Hjuston Rokitsa uprkos tome što su vodili na poluvremenu. Treća deonica ih je koštala pozitivnog ishoda, ali Džejms Harden se pitao i na ovoj utakmici imao 44 poena i 10 skokova. U poraženom timu istakao se Dža Morant sa 23 poena, dok je Marko Gudurić za 17 minuta upisao četiri poena.




Vašington Vizards – Detroit Pistons 115:99

Bruklin Nets – Nju Orlenas Pelikans 135:125

Memfis Grizlis – Hjuston Rokets 100:107

Minesota Timbervulfs – Milvoki Baks 106:134

Finiks Sans – Filadelfija Seventisiksers 114:109

Golden stejt Voriors – Portland Trajlblejzers 127:118
text:
It's time for the Golden State to surprise, Sansa's not kidding [VIDEO]
05 Nov 2019, 09:37 by Nemanja
The Golden State Warriors basketball team beat the Portland Trailblazers 127: 118 on the night between Monday and Tuesday.
None of this would be weird, if it were some of the past five seasons, but in this one, things are a little different. A completely different squad compared to last year's team took to the back of Steve Kerr against the favored Portland team with all-McCallum and Demian Lillard and succeeded in what few had hoped - to beat them.
Warriors were led by basketball players throughout the entire match, losing only one moment in the middle of the game. The second victory of the season, the first in the new Hall, the Chase Center, for a better team mood, although, as things are going, their goal may also be the so-called "tanking".
Eric Pascal had a great night with 34 points and 13 rebounds for the home side, while Key Bowman scored 19. Lillard stood out with 39 points in the Portland jersey.



A slight surprise, according to the bookmakers, was recorded by the team of Phoenix Sans, as they defeated the only undefeated team in the NBA league - the Philadelphia Seventhisksers - on their floor. An uncertain match full of turnarounds still got Sansim in the finish, but Devin Booker with a few tied points made a difference at the very end and brought joy to the home fans in Phoenix.
Booker was the best player in the match with 40 points, while Ricky Rubio had an excellent role with 21 points and 10 rebounds.
Away team Al Harford had 34 points, Tobajas Heris had 24 and 10 rebounds, and Furkan Korkmaz had 20 points.



The Memphis Grizzlies of our Mark Guduric were defeated by the Houston Rockets despite leading at halftime. The third leg cost them a positive outcome, but James Harden wondered and had 44 points and 10 rebounds in this game. The defeated team featured Ja Morant with 23 points, while Marko Guduric scored four points in 17 minutes.




Washington Wizards - Detroit Pistons 115: 99

Brooklyn Nets - New Orleans Pelicans 135: 125

Memphis Grizzlies - Houston Rockets 100: 107

Minnesota Timberwulfs - Milwaukee Bucks 106: 134

Phoenix Sans - Philadelphia Seventisiksers 114: 109

Golden State Warriors - Portland Trailblazers 127: 118
